1.name: §g§lSnake Stance
1.description:
§6Click Combo: §dRIGHT§7-§dLEFT§7-§dRIGHT

§7Enter the §bSnake Stance §2🐍§7, empowering
§7your next §f3§7 §nMain Attacks§7 to deal significantly
§7more damage.

§7You may only be in one §bStance§7 at a time.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f40
§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f+200% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: +160%)
   §8(§2✤§8 Earth: +40%)

2.name: §g§lLeopard Stance
2.description:
§6Click Combo: §dRIGHT§7-§dRIGHT§7-§dRIGHT

§7Enter the §bLeopard Stance §6🐾§7, empowering
§7your next §f3§7 §nMain Attacks§7 to launch you
§7forwards and deal damage to the first
§7enemy hit.

§7You may only be in one §bStance§7 at a time.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f40
§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f+120% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: +100%)
   §8(§f❋§8 Air: +20%)

3.name: §g§lTiger Stance
3.description:
§6Click Combo: §dRIGHT§7-§dLEFT§7-§dLEFT

§7Enter the §bTiger Stance §c🐯§7, empowering
§7your next §f3§7 §nMain Attacks§7 to deal damage
to all enemies around the struck target.

§7You may only be in one §bStance§7 at a time.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f40
§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f120% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 100%)
   §8(§c✹§8 Fire: 20%)
§3☀§7 Radius: §f4.5 Blocks

4.name: §g§lCrane Stance
4.description:
§6Click Combo: §dRIGHT§7-§dRIGHT§7-§dLEFT

§7Enter the §bCrane Stance §3🦩§7, empowering
§7your next §f3§7 §nMain Attacks§7 to weaken
enemies.

§7You may only be in one §bStance§7 at a time.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f40
§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f+120% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: +100%)
   §8(§e✦§8 Thunder: +20%)
§e✧§7 Effect: §f-10%§7 Damage Bonus (§c⚔§7)
§d⌛§7 Duration: §f8s §8(refreshed per hit)

5.name: §f§lCheaper Snake Stance
5.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nSnake Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

6.name: §f§lCheaper Snake Stance
6.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nSnake Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

7.name: §f§lCheaper Leopard Stance
7.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nLeopard Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

8.name: §f§lCheaper Leopard Stance
8.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nLeopard Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

9.name: §f§lGear Proficiency
9.description: §7All your positive IDs are boosted by §f+10%§7.

10.name: §h§lDraconic Flow
10.description:
§7Upon casting a spell, emit a pulse
§7of energy that deals damage to
§7nearby enemies.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f180% §8(Spell Damage)
  §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 140%)
  §8(§b❉§8 Water: 40%)
§3☀§7 Area of Effect: §f4.5 Blocks§7 (Circle-Shaped)

11.name: §f§lCheaper Tiger Stance
11.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nTiger Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

12.name: §f§lCheaper Tiger Stance
12.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nTiger Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

13.name: §f§lCheaper Crane Stance
13.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nCrane Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

14.name: §f§lCheaper Crane Stance
14.description:
§7Reduce the mana cost of §nCrane Stance§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-5

15.name: §h§lFootwork
15.description:
§7After casting a spell, you may
§7double-jump to leap forwards.

§d⌛§7 Cast Window: §f1s

16.name: §f§lEarth Mastery
16.description:
§7Convert §f15%§7 of your §nBase Damage§7
into §2✤ Earth§7 damage.

17.name: §f§lFire Mastery
17.description:
§7Convert §f15%§7 of your §nBase Damage§7
into §c✹ Fire§7 damage.

18.name: §f§lThunder Mastery
18.description:
§7Convert §f15%§7 of your §nBase Damage§7
into §e✦ Thunder§7 damage.

19.name: §f§lAir Mastery
19.description:
§7Convert §f15%§7 of your §nBase Damage§7
into §f❋ Air§7 damage.

20.name: §f§lWater Mastery
20.description:
§7Convert §f15%§7 of your §nBase Damage§7
into §b❉ Water§7 damage.

21.name: §k§lDragon Stance
21.description:
§7While in §bSnake Stance §2🐍§7, attempting to change to
a different §bStance §6🐾§c🐯§3🦩§7 will instead §bInvoke§7 it
for your next §nMain Attack§7, costing less mana.
§8(This does not change your current Stance 🐍)

§7The §nMain Attack§7 will benefit from both the effects
of §bSnake Stance §2🐍§7 and the §bInvoked Stance §6🐾§c🐯§3🦩§7.

§b✺§7 Mana Cost: §f-50%

22.name: §j§lDragon Strike
22.description:
§7§nDragon Stance§7 adds an additional effect to your
§nMain Attack§7 based on the §bInvoked Stance §6🐾§c🐯§3🦩§7:

§bInvoked Leopard §6🐾§7: Deal the same damage to all
other enemies around the target struck.

§3☀§7 Radius: §f4.5 Blocks

§bInvoked Tiger §c🐯§7: The attack deals more damage.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+60% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +60%)

§bInvoked Crane §3🦩§7: The attack damages all nearby
enemies instead.

§3☀§7 Radius: §f4.5 Blocks

23.name: §k§lDragon Technique
23.description:
§7Perform a maneuver upon §bInvoking§7 a §bStance §6🐾§c🐯§3🦩§7:

§bInvoked Leopard §6🐾§7: Damage all nearby enemies,
then leap upwards.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f150% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 120%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 15%)
   §8(§f❋ §8Air: 15%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f6 Blocks

§bInvoked Tiger §c🐯§7: Strike all enemies in front of you.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f240% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 190%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 25%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 25%)
§2➼ §7Radius: §f4.5 Blocks
§3☀ §7Angle: §f180°

§bInvoked Crane §3🦩§7: Damage all nearby enemies,
then pull them towards you and §bProvoke §4💢§7 them.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f150% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 120%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 30%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f6 Blocks
§d⌛§7 Duration: §f2s

24.name: §k§lDragon Dance
24.description:
§7After empowering §f3§7 §nMain Attacks§7 with
§bInvoked Stances §6🐾§c🐯§3🦩§7, cast §nSnake Stance§7
to perform a finishing move based on how
many times each §bStance §6🐾§c🐯§3🦩§7 was §bInvoked§7.
§8(This will not put you in Snake Stance 🐍)§7

The first time an enemy is struck, imbue
them with §bYang §f☯§7.

26.name: §g§lArchetype: Ancient
26.description:
§7Ancients slowly build up damage and
defenses before unleashing it in an
eruptive burst. §8(Setup, Tank)

§7Difficulty: §eMedium
§7Damage: §eMedium
§7Defense: §aHigh
§7Range: §aHigh
§7Speed: §cLow

27.name: §g§lArchetype: Scrapper
27.description:
§7Scrappers overwhelm enemies with
a constant barrage of attacks.
§8(Berserker, Attack Speed)

§7Difficulty: §aEasy
§7Damage: §aHigh
§7Defense: §eMedium
§7Range: §cLow
§7Speed: §eMedium

28.name: §i§lYin
28.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by §nDragon Stance§7
imbue enemies struck with §bYin §8☯§7.

The §bYin §8☯§7 energy erupts after a short delay,
detonating §bYin §8☯§7 on other nearby enemies and
dealing damage to all enemies struck at least once.

§bYin §8☯§7 cannot be reapplied to enemies while they
are afflicted with it.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f150% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 120%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 30%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f4.5 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Delay: §f1.5s

29.name: §i§lYang
29.description:
§7§nDragon Techniques§7 imbue enemies struck with §bYang §f☯§7.

The §bYang §f☯§7 energy erupts after a short delay,
detonating §bYang §f☯§7 on other nearby enemies and
healing all allies struck at least once.

§bYang §f☯§7 cannot be reapplied to enemies while they
are afflicted with it.

§c❤ §7Total Heal: §f5% §8(of your Max Health)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f4.5 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Delay: §f1.5s

30.name: §j§lResonance
30.description:
§7If both §bYin §8☯§7 and §bYang §f☯§7 are present on an
enemy, both energies erupt immediately. This
empowers both effects, increasing its damage,
healing, and granting you §f+5 §7mana once.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+150% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +120%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: +30%)
§c❤ §7Total Heal: §f+5% §8(of your Max Health)

31.name: §f§lReverberation
31.description:
§7The effects of §bYin §8☯§7 and §bYang §f☯§7
gain more area.

§3☀ §7Radius: §f+1.5 Blocks

32.name: §h§lDissonance
32.description:
§7Imbuing enemies with either §bYin §8☯§7 or §bYang §f☯§7
deals damage.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f80% §8(Main Attack Damage, for Yin)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 60%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 20%)

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f80% §8(Spell Damage, for Yang)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 60%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 20%)

33.name: §i§lDragon Breath
33.description:
§7§nDragon Dance§7 empowers your next §nMain Attack§7
to instead project a powerful blast that
explodes and imbues enemies with §bYin §8☯§7.

Afterwards, immediately enter §bSnake Stance §2🐍§7.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f450% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 360%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 45%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 45%)
§2➼ §7Range: §f12 Blocks
§3☀ §7Area of Effect: §f5 Blocks §7(Circle-Shaped)

34.name: §g§lArchetype: Disciple
34.description:
§7Disciples gracefully shift between
offensive, defensive, and mobile
attacks. §8(Combos, Versatility)

§7Difficulty: §cHard
§7Damage: §eMedium
§7Defense: §eMedium
§7Range: §eMedium
§7Speed: §aHigh

35.name: §h§lAcrobatics
35.description:
§7§nFootwork§7 increases the damage of
your next §nMain Attack§7.

§c⚔§7 Main Attack Damage: §f+30%

36.name: §i§lTranquility
36.description:
§7Casting §nCrane Stance§7 briefly grants you
a resistance bonus and makes you perform
a counterattack against all hits you take.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f50% §8(Spell Damage, per hit)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 30%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 10%)
   §8(§f❋ §8Air: 10%)
§e✧ §7Effect: §f+40%§7 Resistance Bonus (§a❁§7)
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f1.5s

37.name: §i§lFerocity
37.description:
§7Casting §nTiger Stance§7 grants you
a damage bonus for a short duration.

§e✧ §7Effect: §f+20%§7 Damage Bonus (§a⚔§7)
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f8s

38.name: §i§lLegerity
38.description:
§7Casting §nLeopard Stance§7 briefly puts you
in stealth, slows your fall, and grants you
a speed bonus.

§e✧ §7Effects: §fInvisibility
             §fSlow Falling
             §f+40%§7 Walk Speed
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f2s

39.name: §k§lDragon Dance (3x Crane)
39.description:
&7Perform a disarming strike that makes
enemies incapable of dealing damage for
a short duration.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f750% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 600%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 150%)
§3☀ §7Radius §f4.5 Blocks
§e✧ §7Effect: §f-100%§7 Damage Bonus (§c⚔§7)
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f3s

40.name: §k§lDragon Dance (2x Crane, 1x Leopard)
40.description:
§7Draw nearby enemies towards you, dealing
damage and heavily slowing them. Then leap
upwards and slow your fall until you land.
§8(Sneak to remove the effect)

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f750% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 600%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 60%)
   §8(§f❋ §8Air: 90%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f6 Blocks
§e✧ §7Effect: §f+80%§7 Slowness (§c⬤§7)
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f4.5s

41.name: §k§lDragon Dance (2x Crane, 1x Tiger)
41.description:
&7Strike nearby enemies, launching them upwards
and making them more vulnerable to damage.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f1000% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 800%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 100%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 100%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f6 Blocks
§e✧ §7Effect: §f-15%§7 Resistance (§c✃§7)
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f4.5s

42.name: §k§lDragon Dance (1x Leopard, 1x Tiger, 1x Crane)
42.description:
&7Dash forwards while damaging enemies
around you §f20§7 times and dragging them
with you.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f50% §8(Spell Damage, per hit)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 40%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 2%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 2%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 2%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 2%)
   §8(§f❋ §8Air: 2%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f6 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f1s

43.name: §k§lDragon Dance (3x Leopard)
43.description:
§7Strike nearby enemies with blinding speed,
becoming invisible while rapidly attacking §f30§7
times.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f25% §8(Spell Damage, per hit)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 20%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 5%)
§3☀§7 Radius: §f6 Blocks
§e✧§7 Effects: §fInvisibility
              §f+100%§7 Walk Speed
§d⌛§7 Duration: §f1.5s

44.name: §k§lDragon Dance (2x Leopard, 1x Tiger)
44.description:
§7Teleport forwards, dealing massive damage
to all enemies in your path.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f1000% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 800%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 80%)
   §8(§f❋§8 Air: 120%)
§2➼§7 Range: §f16 Blocks
§3☀§7 Width: §f4.5 Blocks

45.name: §k§lDragon Dance (2x Leopard, 1x Crane)
45.description:
§7Pounce forwards and enter stealth,
then deal damage and blind enemies
around where you land.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f750% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 600%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 60%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 90%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f4.5 Blocks
§e✧ §7Effects: §fBlindness§7 (§c⬣§7), to Enemies
              §fInvisibility§7, to Self
              §f+60%§7 Walk Speed, to Self
§d⌛ §7Effects Duration: §f4.5s

46.name: §k§lDragon Dance (3x Tiger)
46.description:
§7Eviscerate enemies in front of you
for massive damage, then make enemies
take the same damage again over §f3s§7.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f1000% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 800%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 200%)
§2➼§7 Range: §f4.5 Blocks
§3☀§7 Angle: §f180°

47.name: §k§lDragon Dance (2x Tiger, 1x Leopard)
47.description:
§7Dash forwards while whirling your claws
around you, dealing damage to enemies §f3§7 times.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f500% §8(Spell Damage, per hit)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 400%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 50%)
   §8(§f❋ §8Air: 50%)
§3☀§7 Radius: §f6 Blocks

48.name: §k§lDragon Dance (2x Tiger, 1x Crane)
48.description:
§7Perform §f2§7 rapid strikes in front of you,
healing you if it hits at least one enemy.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f750% §8(Spell Damage, per hit)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: 600%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 90%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 60%)
§c❤ §7Total Heal: §f10% §8(of your Max Health, per strike)
§2➼§7 Range: §f4.5 Blocks
§3☀§7 Angle: §f180°

49.name: §i§lGalvanizing Field
49.description:
§7§nDraconic Flow§7 creates an aura around you
that grants players a speed bonus, and
damages enemies every §f0.2s§7.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f30% §8(Spell Damage, every 0.2s)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 25%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 5%)
§3☀ §7Area of Effect: §f6 Blocks §7(Circle-Shaped)
§e✧ §7Effects: §f+20%§7 Walk Speed
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f6s

50.name: §k§lCorkian Gumption
50.description:
§7When entering a §bStance§7, instead equip
a §bGauntlet§7 that grants you the same
effects. You may equip up to §f2§7 different
§bGauntlets§7 at once.

Your §nMain Attacks§7 will alternate between
each §bGauntlet§7.

51.name: §j§lOverload
51.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by a §bGauntlet§7
creates an electric chain that jumps
to up to §f6§7 additional enemies beyond the
first, inheriting §c-90%§7 less damage and
copying the full effects of the original hit.
§8(Powerhouse Punch will not be inherited)§7

§2➼ §7Range: §f4.5 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Jump Delay: §f0.1s

52.name: §i§lPowerhouse Punch
52.description:
§7Every second §nMain Attack§7 unleashes
an electric burst around the first
target struck, dealing damage to
surrounding enemies.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f200% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 160%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 20%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 20%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f4.5 Blocks

54.name: §f§lHigher Current
54.description:
§7§nOverload§7 can jump to up to §f+6§7
additional enemies.

55.name: §f§lHigher Voltage
55.description:
§7§nOverload§7 inherits §f+15%§7 more of
the original damage.

57.name: §i§lAlternating Current
57.description:
§7If §nOverload§7 runs out of enemies,
the electric chain can jump back to
enemies already struck.

58.name: §k§lElectrodynamics
58.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by the §bLeopard Stance §6🐾§7
build up electrical charge and transfer it to
enemies struck, applying §f+12 §bStatic §e⚡§7 (up to 100).
§nOverload§7 will only apply §c-50%§7 of the amount.

Enemies take damage to discharge §c-1 §bStatic §e⚡§7
every §f0.1s§7.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f50% §8(Spell Damage, every 0.1s)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 40%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 10%)

60.name: §h§lPower Surge
60.description:
§7§nPowerhouse Punch§7 allows you to use §nFootwork§7
afterwards.

61.name: §k§lOverdrive
61.description:
§7Direct hits with your §nMain Attack§7 puts you
at §f+10% §bOverdrive §6⏲§7 (up to 100%). For
every §f25% §bOverdrive §6⏲§7 levels you have,
gain §f+1§7 Fixed Attack Speed (up to +3).

Every §f0.2s§7, you have a chance of electrocuting
a random nearby enemy based on your
§bOverdrive §6⏲§7 level. Whenever this triggers,
lose §c-1% §bOverdrive §6⏲§7 and take §c-0.1%§7 of your
Max Health as damage.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f250% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 200%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 50%)
§2➼ §7Range: §f8 Blocks

64.name: §i§lDynamic Slide
64.description:
§7§nFootwork§7 leaves behind a trail of §f5§7 sparks
that deal damage to nearby enemies.

If you have §nElectrodynamics§7, each spark
will apply §f+2 §bStatic §e⚡§7 to all enemies struck.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f60% §8(Spell Damage, per spark)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 50%)
   §8(§e✦ §8Thunder: 10%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f3 Blocks

65.name: §h§lShort Circuit
65.description:
§7Whenever an enemy gets electrocuted
with §nOverdrive§7, apply the §bStatic §e⚡§7 effects
from one of your current §bGauntlets§7
chosen at random.

68.name: §h§lHeavy Strikes I
68.description:
§7Increase the damage of your
§nMain Attacks§7 by §f+25%§7.

69.name: §i§lSagacity
69.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by §bSnake Stance §2🐍§7
deal modified damage, and restore §f+5§7 mana
if it hits an enemy.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f+0% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§2✤§8 Earth: -20%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: +20%)

70.name: §f§lSwift Strikes II
70.description:
§7Increase your Fixed Attack Speed by §f+1§7.

§7Reduce the damage of your §nMain Attacks§7
by §c-50%§7.

71.name: §j§lDisciplined Force
71.description:
§7After casting a spell, waiting for at least §f1s§7
before using your §nMain Attack§7 will empower it
to deal additional damage and restore §f10§7 mana.

This will immediately put you out of your
current §bStance§7.

§c⚔§7 Total Damage: §f+250% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣§8 Damage: +200%)
   §8(§2✤§8 Earth: +50%)

72.name: §i§lImpact Crater
72.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by §bTiger Stance §c🐯§7
create boiling craters that deal damage and
slow enemies every §f0.5s§7.

You may have up to §f3§7 craters at once.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f50% §8(Spell Damage, every 0.5s)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 40%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 10%)
§e✧ §7Effect: §f20%§7 Slowness (§c⬤§7)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f8 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f3s

73.name: §k§lMagma Armor
73.description:
§7While in §bCrane Stance §3🦩§7, your §nMain Attacks§7
grant you §f+1 §bStone Layer §6🪨§7 (up to 5). Lose
§c-1 §bStone Layer §6🪨§7 every §f3s§7, resetting
whenever you gain a stack.

Once you reach §f5 §bStone Layers §6🪨§7, cause an
eruption around you that shatters all
§bStone Layers §6🪨§7 and deals damage to nearby
enemies.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f500% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 400%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 50%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 50%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f8 Blocks
§3⌚ §7Cooldown: §f5s §8(starts after the eruption)

74.name: §j§lPressure
74.description:
§7The eruption from §nMagma Armor§7 deals
more damage and gains more area for
every §f1s§7 you spend with §f3+ §bStone Layers §6🪨§7
(up to x10).

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+100% §8(Main Attack Damage, per 1s)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +60%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: +20%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: +20%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f+0.8 Blocks §8(per 1s)

75.name: §i§lVolcanic Fissure
75.description:
§7When empowered by §nDisciplined Force§7,
§bTiger Stance §c🐯§7 causes all nearby
§nImpact Craters§7 to erupt, dealing damage
to enemies above them and refreshing
their duration.

Increase §nImpact Crater§7's base duration.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f200% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 160%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 20%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 20%)
§2➼ §7Range: §f16 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f+7s

77.name: §i§lTectonic Shift
77.description:
§7When empowered by §nDisciplined Force§7,
§bLeopard Stance §6🐾§7 will no longer cause you
to dash, but will deal its damage to all nearby
enemies and launch them in the direction you
are facing.

If you are above an §nImpact Crater§7, move it
§f8§7 blocks towards the direction you are facing.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+200% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +160%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: +30%)
   §8(§f❋ §8Air: +10%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f8 Blocks

78.name: §k§lIchor of Garaheth
78.description:
§7When empowered by §nDisciplined Force§7,
§bSnake Stance §2🐍§7 causes an explosion that
deals damage and imbues enemies struck
with §f+3 §bIchor §5⚕§7 (up to 3).

§nDraconic Flow§7 consumes §c-1 §bIchor §5⚕§7 from
enemies struck, dealing the same amount
of damage again and briefly slowing them.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f200% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 160%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 20%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 20%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f8 Blocks
§e✧ §7Effect: §f80%§7 Slowness (§c⬤§7)
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f1s

79.name: §j§lObsidian Shards
79.description:
§7Whenever you consume §bIchor §5⚕§7 from enemies,
they drop an §bObsidian Shard§7 in a random
nearby location. Picking up an §bObsidian Shard§7
grants you §f+5% §bOverhealth §6❤§7 (up to 25%),
decaying over §f10s§7.

When enemies die with §bIchor §5⚕§7, they drop an
§bObsidian Shard§7.

§2➼ §7Range: §f8 Blocks
§d⌛ §7Duration: §f5s

80.name: §j§lEarthquake
80.description:
§7While you have §f3+ §bStone Layers §6🪨§7,
holding shift will cause the ground around
you to rumble, constantly dealing damage
and pulling nearby enemies and
§bObsidian Shards§7 towards you every §f0.2s§7.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f30% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 24%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 3%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: 3%)
§3☀ §7Radius: §f10 Blocks

81.name: §i§lLast Stand
81.description:
§7Deal §f+20%§7 more damage while your
health is below §f50%§7.

82.name: §k§lPyroclasm
82.description:
§7Once §nMagma Armor§7 erupts with maximum §nPressure§7,
you and all nearby §nImpact Craters§7 will erupt into
a pillar of lava, dealing heavy damage to all enemies
within their area over §f3s§7.

Affected §nImpact Craters§7 will disappear afterwards.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f1000% §8(Main Attack Damage, for Magma Armor)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 600%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 300%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 100%)

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f750% §8(Spell Damage, for Impact Craters)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: 450%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: 100%)
   §8(§c✹ §8Fire: 200%)
§2➼ §7Range: §f16 Blocks

83.name: §f§lEminence
83.description:
§7§nDraconic Flow§7 deals more damage.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+80% §8(Spell Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +60%)
   §8(§b❉ §8Water: +20%)

84.name: §f§lPresence
84.description:
§7§nDraconic Flow§7 gains more area of effect.

§3☀ §7Radius: §f+3.5 Blocks

86.name: §h§lMaul
86.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by §bTiger Stance §c🐯§7
pull enemies inwards.

§3☀ §7Radius: §f+3.5 Blocks

88.name: §h§lLimber
88.description:
§7§nFootwork§7 cleanses you of all
negative effects and fire.

89.name: §f§lVital Strikes
89.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by §bSnake Stance §2🐍§7
deal more damage.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+50% §8(Main Attack Damage)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +50%)

90.name: §f§lDisabling Strikes
90.description:
§7§nMain Attacks§7 empowered by §bCrane Stance §3🦩§7
further weaken enemies.

§e✧§7 Effect: §f-10%§7 Damage Bonus (§c⚔§7)

91.name: §f§lMagma Chamber
91.description:
§7§nPressure§7 stores more damage every §f1s§7.

§c⚔ §7Total Damage: §f+50% §8(Main Attack Damage, per 1s)
   §8(§6✣ §8Damage: +40%)
   §8(§2✤ §8Earth: +10%)

93.name: §h§lCollapse
93.description:
§7§nVolcanic Fissure§7 also expands the size
of affected §nImpact Craters§7.

§3☀ §7Radius §f+2 Blocks §8(up to +8 Blocks)

95.name: §h§lObsidian Scales
95.description:
§7Taking damage with §f3+ §bRock Layers §6🪨§7
will drop an §bObsidian Shard§7 nearby.

§2➼ §7Range: §f8 Blocks
§3⌚ §7Cooldown: §f1s

96.name: §h§lStone Skin
96.description:
§7Each §bStone Layer §6🪨§7 you have reduces all
damage you take by §f-5%§7.

While you have §f3+ §bStone Layers §6🪨§7, become
immune to knockback.

97.name: §f§lHeavy Strikes II
97.description:
§7Decrease your Fixed Attack Speed by §c-1§7.

§7Increase the damage of your §nMain Attacks§7
by §f+50%§7.

99.name: §j§lStatic Discharge
99.description:
§7Your §nMain Attacks§7 can consume §bStatic §e⚡§7 on enemies
for a different effect based on the §bGauntlet§7 used:

§bTiger Gauntlet §c🐯§7: Instantly discharge §c-2 §bStatic §e⚡§7
without dealing its damage, reducing resistances
instead (up to 15x).

§e✧ §7Effect: §f-1%§7 Resistance Bonus (§c✃§7), per stack
§d⌛§7 Duration: §f6s §8(refreshed per stack)

§bCrane Gauntlet §3🦩§7: Instantly discharge §c-2 §bStatic §e⚡§7
without dealing its damage, healing you instead.

§c❤ §7Total Heal: §f1% §8(of your Max Health)

§7§nOverload§7 will copy these effects with §c-50%§7 efficacy.

100.name: §h§lAdaptive Hardware
100.description:
§7Your §bSnake Gauntlet §2🐍§7 will copy the §bStatic §e⚡§7
effects of your other equipped §bGauntlet§7.

You may apply up to §f+100§7 §bStatic §e⚡§7 on enemies.

103.name: §g§lMain Attacks
103.description:
§6Click Input: §dLEFT-CLICK§7

§7Your §nMain Attacks§7 are the default Minecraft punches,
each dealing §f100%§7 of your Main Attack Damage.

Performing a Left-Click counts as using your
§nMain Attack§7 even if it did not have a target mob.

§2➼ §7Range: §f3 Blocks

104.name: §h§lHigher Resistance
104.description:
§7§nGalvanizing Field§7 also grants players
more resistance.

§e✧ §7Effect: §f+20%§7 Resistance Bonus (§a❁§7)

105.name: §g§lWeapon
105.description:
§7You cannot use any weapons.

Your Base Damage scales based on your
current level.

You have an initial Fixed Attack Speed of
§fVery Slow§7.

Attack Speed modification from items will
instead increase or decrease your
Main Attack Damage, up to a limit.
